DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim evaluate subject high risk future development hypertension , family history hypertension and/or already high normal ( SBP 120-139 mmHg DBP 80-89 mmHg ) blood pressure . The investigator plan investigate whether subject marker ( microscopic protein urine C-reactive protein blood ) blood urine people high blood pressure , whether improve take beta-blocker nebivolol .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Beta-blocker Nebivolol ( Bystolic ) Subjects With High Normal Blood Pressure and/or Family History Hypertension

Subjects SBP > 140 SBP < 120 DBP > 90 DBP < 80 We exclude subject whose family member know secondary etiology hypertension hyperaldosteronism Cushing 's Disease .
